pli-tv-pvr5:0.2.eng: The legal issues and their settling

pli-tv-pvr5:0.3.eng: 1. The section with a succession on legal issues

pli-tv-pvr5:1.1.eng: In regard to legal issues arising from disputes:

pli-tv-pvr5:1.8.eng: Through how many motives does one dispute?

pli-tv-pvr5:1.9.eng: Through how many principles for settling is a legal issue arising from a dispute settled?
pli-tv-pvr5:1.9.comm: In this chapter samatha, “settling”, seems to be used as a shorthand for samathadhamma, “principle for settling”.

pli-tv-pvr5:2.1.eng: In regard to legal issues arising from accusations:

pli-tv-pvr5:2.8.eng: Through how many motives does one accuse?

pli-tv-pvr5:2.9.eng: Through how many principles for settling is a legal issue arising from an accusation settled?

pli-tv-pvr5:3.1.eng: In regard to legal issues arising from offenses:

pli-tv-pvr5:3.8.eng: Through how many motives does one commit an offense?

pli-tv-pvr5:3.9.eng: Through how many principles for settling is a legal issue arising from an offense settled?

pli-tv-pvr5:4.1.eng: In regard to legal issues arising from business:

pli-tv-pvr5:4.8.eng: Through how many motives does one give rise to business?

pli-tv-pvr5:4.9.eng: Through how many principles for settling is a legal issue arising from business settled?

pli-tv-pvr5:5.1.eng: “What is the forerunner of legal issues arising from disputes?”

pli-tv-pvr5:5.2.pli: Lobho pubbaṅgamo, doso pubbaṅgamo, moho pubbaṅgamo, alobho pubbaṅgamo, adoso pubbaṅgamo, amoho pubbaṅgamo.
pli-tv-pvr5:5.2.eng: Desire is a forerunner, ill will is a forerunner, confusion is a forerunner, non-desire is a forerunner, non-ill will is a forerunner, non-confusion is a forerunner.

pli-tv-pvr5:5.4.comm: A more literal but clunky rendering would be: “The reasons which are the eighteen grounds for schism.”

pli-tv-pvr5:5.11.pli: tayo kusalahetū, tayo akusalahetū, tayo abyākatahetū.
pli-tv-pvr5:5.11.eng: there are three wholesome causes, three unwholesome causes, and three indeterminate causes.

pli-tv-pvr5:5.14.eng: “Through how many motives does one dispute?”

pli-tv-pvr5:5.16.eng: through a view that accords with the Teaching or through a view that is contrary to the Teaching.

pli-tv-pvr5:5.17.eng: “Through how many principles for settling is a legal issue arising from a dispute settled?”

pli-tv-pvr5:5.19.eng: through resolution face-to-face and through a majority decision.

pli-tv-pvr5:6.1.eng: “What is the forerunner of legal issues arising from accusations?”

pli-tv-pvr5:6.2.pli: Lobho pubbaṅgamo, doso pubbaṅgamo, moho pubbaṅgamo, alobho pubbaṅgamo, adoso pubbaṅgamo, amoho pubbaṅgamo.
pli-tv-pvr5:6.2.eng: Desire is a forerunner, ill will is a forerunner, confusion is a forerunner, non-desire is a forerunner, non-ill will is a forerunner, non-confusion is a forerunner.

pli-tv-pvr5:6.11.pli: tayo kusalahetū, tayo akusalahetū, tayo abyākatahetū.
pli-tv-pvr5:6.11.eng: there are three wholesome causes, three unwholesome causes, and three indeterminate causes.

pli-tv-pvr5:6.14.eng: “Through how many motives does one accuse?”

pli-tv-pvr5:6.17.eng: “Through how many principles for settling is a legal issue arising from an accusation settled?”

pli-tv-pvr5:6.19.pli: sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:6.19.eng: through resolution face-to-face, through resolution through recollection, through resolution because of past insanity, and through a further penalty.

pli-tv-pvr5:7.1.eng: “What is the forerunner of legal issues arising from offenses?”

pli-tv-pvr5:7.2.pli: Lobho pubbaṅgamo, doso pubbaṅgamo, moho pubbaṅgamo, alobho pubbaṅgamo, adoso pubbaṅgamo, amoho pubbaṅgamo.
pli-tv-pvr5:7.2.eng: Desire is a forerunner, ill will is a forerunner, confusion is a forerunner, non-desire is a forerunner, non-ill will is a forerunner, non-confusion is a forerunner.

pli-tv-pvr5:7.11.eng: three unwholesome causes and three indeterminate causes.

pli-tv-pvr5:7.14.eng: “Through how many motives does one commit an offense?”

pli-tv-pvr5:7.16.pli: alajjitā, aññāṇatā, kukkuccapakatatā, akappiye kappiyasaññitā, kappiye akappiyasaññitā, satisammosā.
pli-tv-pvr5:7.16.eng: through shamelessness, through ignorance, through being overcome by anxiety, through perceiving what is unallowable as allowable, through perceiving what is allowable as unallowable, through absentmindedness.
pli-tv-pvr5:7.16.comm: “Through being overcome by anxiety” renders kukkuccapakatā. Sp 3.175: Evaṁ pubbabhāge sanniṭṭhānaṁ katvāpi karaṇakkhaṇe akappiye akappiyasaññitāsaṅkhātena kukkuccena abhibhūtā “kukkuccapakatā”ti, “Kukkuccapakatā: thus, having decided first, then at the moment of the unallowable action, one is overwhelmed by anxiety due to the perception of unallowableness.”

pli-tv-pvr5:7.17.eng: “Through how many principles for settling is a legal issue arising from an offense settled?”

pli-tv-pvr5:7.19.pli: sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:7.19.eng: through resolution face-to-face and through acting according to what has been admitted, and through resolution face-to-face and through covering over as if with grass.

pli-tv-pvr5:8.1.eng: “What is the forerunner of legal issues arising from business?”

pli-tv-pvr5:8.2.pli: Lobho pubbaṅgamo, doso pubbaṅgamo, moho pubbaṅgamo, alobho pubbaṅgamo, adoso pubbaṅgamo, amoho pubbaṅgamo.
pli-tv-pvr5:8.2.eng: Desire is a forerunner, ill will is a forerunner, confusion is a forerunner, non-desire is a forerunner, non-ill will is a forerunner, non-confusion is a forerunner.

pli-tv-pvr5:8.11.pli: tayo kusalahetū, tayo akusalahetū, tayo abyākatahetū.
pli-tv-pvr5:8.11.eng: there are three wholesome causes, three unwholesome causes, and three indeterminate causes.

pli-tv-pvr5:8.15.eng: “Through how many motives does one give rise to business?”

pli-tv-pvr5:8.17.eng: through a motion or through getting permission.

pli-tv-pvr5:8.18.eng: “Through how many principles for settling is a legal issue arising from business settled?”

pli-tv-pvr5:9.1.eng: How many principles for settling are there?

pli-tv-pvr5:9.3.pli: Sammukhāvinayo, sativinayo, amūḷhavinayo, paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ, yebhuyyasikā, tassapāpiyasikā, tiṇavatthārako—
pli-tv-pvr5:9.3.eng: resolution face-to-face, resolution through recollection, resolution because of past insanity, acting according to what has been admitted, a majority decision, a further penalty, and covering over as if with grass.

pli-tv-pvr5:10.1.pli: Siyā ime satta samathā dasa samathā honti, dasa samathā satta samathā honti vatthuvasena pariyāyena?
pli-tv-pvr5:10.1.eng: With a different presentation, might the seven principles for settling become ten, and the ten become seven?

pli-tv-pvr5:11.2.pli: Vivādādhikaraṇassa dve samathā, anuvādādhikaraṇassa cattāro samathā, āpattādhikaraṇassa tayo samathā, kiccādhikaraṇassa eko samatho.
pli-tv-pvr5:11.2.eng: A legal issue arising from a dispute is settled through two principles, a legal issue arising from an accusation is settled through four principles, a legal issue arising from an offense is settled through three principles, a legal issue arising from business is settled through one principle.

pli-tv-pvr5:11.3.pli: Evaṃ ime satta samathā dasa samathā honti, dasa samathā satta samathā honti vatthuvasena pariyāyena.
pli-tv-pvr5:11.3.eng: In this way, the seven principles for settling become ten, and the ten become seven.

pli-tv-pvr5:12.1.eng: The sixth section on “a different presentation” is finished.

pli-tv-pvr5:13.1.eng: How many of the principles for settling legal issues arising from disputes do the monks and the nuns have in common?

pli-tv-pvr5:13.2.eng: How many do they not have in common?

pli-tv-pvr5:13.3.eng: How many of the principles for settling legal issues arising from accusations do the monks and the nuns have in common?

pli-tv-pvr5:13.4.eng: How many do they not have in common?

pli-tv-pvr5:13.5.eng: How many of the principles for settling legal issues arising from offenses do the monks and the nuns have in common?

pli-tv-pvr5:13.6.eng: How many do they not have in common?

pli-tv-pvr5:13.7.eng: How many of the principles for settling legal issues arising from business do the monks and the nuns have in common?

pli-tv-pvr5:13.8.eng: How many do they not have in common?

pli-tv-pvr5:14.1.eng: They have two principles for settling legal issues arising from disputes in common:

pli-tv-pvr5:14.2.eng: resolution face-to-face and a majority decision.

pli-tv-pvr5:14.3.eng: And they have five not in common:

pli-tv-pvr5:14.4.eng: resolution through recollection, resolution because of past insanity, acting according to what has been admitted, a further penalty, and covering over as if with grass.

pli-tv-pvr5:15.1.eng: They have four principles for settling legal issues arising from accusations in common:

pli-tv-pvr5:15.2.eng: resolution face-to-face, resolution through recollection, resolution because of past insanity, and a further penalty.

pli-tv-pvr5:15.3.eng: And they have three not in common:

pli-tv-pvr5:15.4.eng: a majority decision, acting according to what has been admitted, and covering over as if with grass.

pli-tv-pvr5:16.1.eng: They have three principles for settling legal issues arising from offenses in common:

pli-tv-pvr5:16.2.eng: resolution face-to-face, acting according to what has been admitted, and covering over as if with grass.

pli-tv-pvr5:16.3.eng: And they have four not in common:

pli-tv-pvr5:16.4.eng: a majority decision, resolution through recollection, resolution because of past insanity, and a further penalty.

pli-tv-pvr5:17.1.eng: They have one principle for settling legal issues arising from business in common:

pli-tv-pvr5:17.3.eng: And they have six not in common:

pli-tv-pvr5:17.4.pli: yebhuyyasikā, sativinayo, amūḷhavinayo, paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ, tassapāpiyasikā, tiṇavatthārako.
pli-tv-pvr5:17.4.eng: a majority decision, resolution through recollection, resolution because of past insanity, acting according to what has been admitted, a further penalty, and covering over as if with grass.

pli-tv-pvr5:18.1.eng: The seventh section on “in common” is finished.

pli-tv-pvr5:19.1.eng: How many principles for settling are there that belong to legal issues arising from disputes?

pli-tv-pvr5:19.2.eng: How many belong to something else?

pli-tv-pvr5:19.3.eng: How many principles for settling are there that belong to legal issues arising from accusations?

pli-tv-pvr5:19.4.eng: How many belong to something else?

pli-tv-pvr5:19.5.eng: How many principles for settling are there that belong to legal issues arising from offenses?

pli-tv-pvr5:19.6.eng: How many belong to something else?

pli-tv-pvr5:19.7.eng: How many principles for settling are there that belong to legal issues arising from business?

pli-tv-pvr5:19.8.eng: How many belong to something else?

pli-tv-pvr5:20.1.eng: There are two principles for settling that belong to legal issues arising from disputes:

pli-tv-pvr5:20.2.eng: resolution face-to-face and a majority decision.

pli-tv-pvr5:20.3.eng: And there are five that belong to something else:

pli-tv-pvr5:20.4.eng: resolution through recollection, resolution because of past insanity, acting according to what has been admitted, a further penalty, and covering over as if with grass.

pli-tv-pvr5:21.1.eng: There are four principles for settling that belong to legal issues arising from accusations:

pli-tv-pvr5:21.2.eng: resolution face-to-face, resolution through recollection, resolution because of past insanity, and a further penalty.

pli-tv-pvr5:21.3.eng: And there are three that belong to something else:

pli-tv-pvr5:21.4.eng: a majority decision, acting according to what has been admitted, and covering over as if with grass.

pli-tv-pvr5:22.1.eng: There are three principles for settling that belong to legal issues arising from offenses:

pli-tv-pvr5:22.2.eng: resolution face-to-face, acting according to what has been admitted, and covering over as if with grass.

pli-tv-pvr5:22.3.eng: And there are four that belong to something else:

pli-tv-pvr5:22.4.eng: a majority decision, resolution through recollection, resolution because of past insanity, and a further penalty.

pli-tv-pvr5:23.1.eng: There is one principle for settling that belongs to legal issues arising from business:

pli-tv-pvr5:23.3.eng: And there are six that belong to something else:

pli-tv-pvr5:23.4.pli: yebhuyyasikā, sativinayo, amūḷhavinayo, paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ, tassapāpiyasikā, tiṇavatthārako.
pli-tv-pvr5:23.4.eng: a majority decision, resolution through recollection, resolution because of past insanity, acting according to what has been admitted, a further penalty, and covering over as if with grass.

pli-tv-pvr5:24.1.eng: The eighth section on “belonging to that” is finished

pli-tv-pvr5:25.0.eng: 4. The section on different principles for settling used in common

pli-tv-pvr5:25.1.pli: Samathā samathassa sādhāraṇā, samathā samathassa asādhāraṇā.
pli-tv-pvr5:25.1.eng: One principle for settling is used in common with another principle for settling, and one principle for settling is not used in common with another principle for settling.

pli-tv-pvr5:25.2.pli: Siyā samathā samathassa sādhāraṇā, siyā samathā samathassa asādhāraṇā.
pli-tv-pvr5:25.2.eng: It may be that one principle for settling is used in common with another principle for settling, and it may be that one principle for settling is not used in common with another principle for settling.

pli-tv-pvr5:26.1.eng: How may it be that one principle for settling is used in common with another principle for settling?

pli-tv-pvr5:26.2.eng: How may it be that one principle for settling is not used in common with another principle for settling?

pli-tv-pvr5:26.3.pli: Yebhuyyasikā sammukhāvinayassa sādhāraṇā, sativinayassa amūḷhavinayassa paṭiññātakaraṇassa tassapāpiyasikāya tiṇavatthārakassa asādhāraṇā.
pli-tv-pvr5:26.3.eng: A majority decision is used in common with resolution face-to-face. It is not used in common with resolution through recollection, resolution because of past insanity, acting according to what has been admitted, a further penalty, or covering over as if with grass.

pli-tv-pvr5:27.1.pli: Sativinayo sammukhāvinayassa sādhāraṇo, amūḷhavinayassa paṭiññātakaraṇassa tassapāpiyasikāya tiṇavatthārakassa yebhuyyasikāya asādhāraṇo.
pli-tv-pvr5:27.1.eng: Resolution through recollection is used in common with resolution face-to-face. It is not used in common with resolution because of past insanity, acting according to what has been admitted, a further penalty, covering over as if with grass, or a majority decision.

pli-tv-pvr5:28.1.pli: Amūḷhavinayo sammukhāvinayassa sādhāraṇo, paṭiññātakaraṇassa tassapāpiyasikāya tiṇavatthārakassa yebhuyyasikāya sativinayassa asādhāraṇo.
pli-tv-pvr5:28.1.eng: Resolution because of past insanity is used in common with resolution face-to-face. It is not used in common with acting according to what has been admitted, a further penalty, covering over as if with grass, a majority decision, or resolution through recollection.

pli-tv-pvr5:29.1.pli: Paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayassa sādhāraṇaṃ, tassapāpiyasikāya tiṇavatthārakassa yebhuyyasikāya sativinayassa amūḷhavinayassa asādhāraṇaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr5:29.1.eng: Acting according to what has been admitted is used in common with resolution face-to-face. It is not used in common with a further penalty, covering over as if with grass, a majority decision, resolution through recollection, or resolution because of past insanity.

pli-tv-pvr5:30.1.pli: Tassapāpiyasikā sammukhāvinayassa sādhāraṇā, tiṇavatthārakassa yebhuyyasikāya sativinayassa amūḷhavinayassa paṭiññātakaraṇassa asādhāraṇā.
pli-tv-pvr5:30.1.eng: A further penalty is used in common with resolution face-to-face. It is not used in common with covering over as if with grass, a majority decision, resolution through recollection, resolution because of past insanity, or acting according to what has been admitted.

pli-tv-pvr5:31.1.pli: Tiṇavatthārako sammukhāvinayassa sādhāraṇo, yebhuyyasikāya sativinayassa amūḷhavinayassa paṭiññātakaraṇassa tassapāpiyasikāya asādhāraṇo.
pli-tv-pvr5:31.1.eng: Covering over as if with grass is used in common with resolution face-to-face. It is not used in common with a majority decision, resolution through recollection, resolution because of past insanity, acting according to what has been admitted, or a further penalty.

pli-tv-pvr5:33.1.eng: The ninth section on different principles for settling used in common is finished.

pli-tv-pvr5:34.0.eng: 5. The section on different principles for settling belonging with each other

pli-tv-pvr5:34.1.pli: Samathā samathassa tabbhāgiyā, samathā samathassa aññabhāgiyā.
pli-tv-pvr5:34.1.eng: One principle for settling belongs with another principle for settling, and one principle for settling does not belong with another principle for settling.

pli-tv-pvr5:34.2.pli: Siyā samathā samathassa tabbhāgiyā, siyā samathā samathassa aññabhāgiyā.
pli-tv-pvr5:34.2.eng: It may be that one principle for settling belongs with another principle for settling, and it may be that one principle for settling does not belong with another principle for settling.

pli-tv-pvr5:35.1.eng: How may it be that one principle for settling belongs with another principle for settling?

pli-tv-pvr5:35.2.eng: How may it be that one principle for settling does not belong with another principle for settling?

pli-tv-pvr5:35.3.pli: Yebhuyyasikā sammukhāvinayassa tabbhāgiyā, sativinayassa amūḷhavinayassa paṭiññātakaraṇassa tassapāpiyasikāya tiṇavatthārakassa aññabhāgiyā.
pli-tv-pvr5:35.3.eng: A majority decision belongs with resolution face-to-face. It does not belong with resolution through recollection, resolution because of past insanity, acting according to what has been admitted, a further penalty, or covering over as if with grass.

pli-tv-pvr5:36.1.pli: Sativinayo sammukhāvinayassa tabbhāgiyo, amūḷhavinayassa paṭiññātakaraṇassa tassapāpiyasikāya tiṇavatthārakassa yebhuyyasikāya aññabhāgiyo.
pli-tv-pvr5:36.1.eng: Resolution through recollection belongs with resolution face-to-face. It does not belong with resolution because of past insanity, acting according to what has been admitted, a further penalty, covering over as if with grass, or a majority decision.

pli-tv-pvr5:37.1.pli: Amūḷhavinayo sammukhāvinayassa tabbhāgiyo, paṭiññātakaraṇassa tassapāpiyasikāya tiṇavatthārakassa yebhuyyasikāya sativinayassa aññabhāgiyo.
pli-tv-pvr5:37.1.eng: Resolution because of past insanity belongs with resolution face-to-face. It does not belong with acting according to what has been admitted, a further penalty, covering over as if with grass, a majority decision, or resolution through recollection.

pli-tv-pvr5:38.1.pli: Paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayassa tabbhāgiyaṃ, tassapāpiyasikāya tiṇavatthārakassa yebhuyyasikāya sativinayassa amūḷhavinayassa aññabhāgiyaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr5:38.1.eng: Acting according to what has been admitted belongs with resolution face-to-face. It does not belong with a further penalty, covering over as if with grass, a majority decision, resolution through recollection, or resolution because of past insanity.

pli-tv-pvr5:39.1.pli: Tassapāpiyasikā sammukhāvinayassa tabbhāgiyā, tiṇavatthārakassa yebhuyyasikāya sativinayassa amūḷhavinayassa paṭiññātakaraṇassa aññabhāgiyā.
pli-tv-pvr5:39.1.eng: A further penalty belongs with resolution face-to-face. It does not belong with covering over as if with grass, a majority decision, resolution through recollection, resolution because of past insanity, or acting according to what has been admitted.

pli-tv-pvr5:40.1.pli: Tiṇavatthārako sammukhāvinayassa tabbhāgiyo, yebhuyyasikāya sativinayassa amūḷhavinayassa paṭiññātakaraṇassa tassapāpiyasikāya aññabhāgiyo.
pli-tv-pvr5:40.1.eng: Covering over as if with grass belongs with resolution face-to-face. It does not belong with a majority decision, resolution through recollection, resolution because of past insanity, acting according to what has been admitted, or a further penalty.

pli-tv-pvr5:41.1.pli: Evaṃ siyā samathā samathassa tabbhāgiyā, evaṃ siyā samathā samathassa aññabhāgiyā.

pli-tv-pvr5:42.1.eng: The tenth section on different principles for settling belonging with each other is finished.

pli-tv-pvr5:43.0.eng: 6. The section on “is a principle for settling also resolution face-to-face?”

pli-tv-pvr5:43.1.eng: Is a principle for settling also resolution face-to-face, and is resolution face-to-face also a principle for settling?

pli-tv-pvr5:43.2.eng: Is a principle for settling also a majority decision, and is a majority decision also a principle for settling?

pli-tv-pvr5:43.3.eng: Is a principle for settling also resolution through recollection, and is resolution through recollection also a principle for settling?

pli-tv-pvr5:43.4.eng: Is a principle for settling also resolution because of past insanity, and is resolution because of past insanity also a principle for settling?

pli-tv-pvr5:43.5.eng: Is a principle for settling also acting according to what has been admitted, and is acting according to what has been admitted also a principle for settling?

pli-tv-pvr5:43.6.eng: Is a principle for settling also a further penalty, and is a further penalty also a principle for settling?

pli-tv-pvr5:43.7.eng: Is a principle for settling also covering over as if with grass, and is covering over as if with grass also a principle for settling?

pli-tv-pvr5:44.1.pli: Yebhuyyasikā sativinayo amūḷhavinayo paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ tassapāpiyasikā tiṇavatthārako—
pli-tv-pvr5:44.1.eng: A majority decision, resolution through recollection, resolution because of past insanity, acting according to what has been admitted, a further penalty, and covering over as if with grass:

pli-tv-pvr5:44.2.eng: these principles for settling are principles for settling, but they are not resolution face-to-face.

pli-tv-pvr5:44.3.eng: Resolution face-to-face is both a principle for settling and also resolution face-to-face.

pli-tv-pvr5:45.1.pli: Sativinayo amūḷhavinayo paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ tassapāpiyasikā tiṇavatthārako sammukhāvinayo—
pli-tv-pvr5:45.1.eng: Resolution through recollection, resolution because of past insanity, acting according to what has been admitted, a further penalty, covering over as if with grass, and resolution face-to-face:

pli-tv-pvr5:45.2.eng: these principles for settling are principles for settling, but they are not a majority decision.

pli-tv-pvr5:45.3.eng: A majority decision is both a principle for settling and also a majority decision.

pli-tv-pvr5:46.1.pli: Amūḷhavinayo paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ tassapāpiyasikā tiṇavatthārako sammukhāvinayo yebhuyyasikā—
pli-tv-pvr5:46.1.eng: Resolution because of past insanity, acting according to what has been admitted, a further penalty, covering over as if with grass, resolution face-to-face, and a majority decision:

pli-tv-pvr5:46.2.eng: these principles for settling are principles for settling, but they are not resolution through recollection.

pli-tv-pvr5:46.3.eng: Resolution through recollection is both a principle for settling and also resolution through recollection.

pli-tv-pvr5:47.1.pli: Paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ tassapāpiyasikā tiṇavatthārako sammukhāvinayo yebhuyyasikā sativinayo—
pli-tv-pvr5:47.1.eng: Acting according to what has been admitted, a further penalty, covering over as if with grass, resolution face-to-face, a majority decision, and resolution through recollection:

pli-tv-pvr5:47.2.eng: these principles for settling are principles for settling, but they are not resolution because of past insanity.

pli-tv-pvr5:47.3.eng: Resolution because of past insanity is both a principle for settling and also resolution because of past insanity.

pli-tv-pvr5:48.1.pli: Tassapāpiyasikā tiṇavatthārako sammukhāvinayo yebhuyyasikā sativinayo amūḷhavinayo—
pli-tv-pvr5:48.1.eng: A further penalty, covering over as if with grass, resolution face-to-face, a majority decision, resolution through recollection, and resolution because of past insanity:

pli-tv-pvr5:48.2.eng: these principles for settling are principles for settling, but they are not acting according to what has been admitted.

pli-tv-pvr5:48.3.eng: Acting according to what has been admitted is both a principle for settling and also acting according to what has been admitted.

pli-tv-pvr5:49.1.pli: Tiṇavatthārako sammukhāvinayo yebhuyyasikā sativinayo amūḷhavinayo paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ—
pli-tv-pvr5:49.1.eng: Covering over as if with grass, resolution face-to-face, a majority decision, resolution through recollection, resolution because of past insanity, and acting according to what has been admitted:

pli-tv-pvr5:49.2.eng: these principles for settling are principles for settling, but they are not a further penalty.

pli-tv-pvr5:49.3.eng: A further penalty is both a principle for settling and also a further penalty.

pli-tv-pvr5:50.1.pli: Sammukhāvinayo yebhuyyasikā sativinayo amūḷhavinayo paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ tassapāpiyasikā—
pli-tv-pvr5:50.1.eng: Resolution face-to-face, a majority decision, resolution through recollection, resolution because of past insanity, acting according to what has been admitted, and a further penalty:

pli-tv-pvr5:50.2.eng: these principles for settling are principles for settling, but they are not covering over as if with grass.

pli-tv-pvr5:50.3.eng: Covering over as if with grass is both a principle for settling and also covering over as if with grass.

pli-tv-pvr5:51.1.eng: The eleventh section on “is a principle for settling also resolution face-to-face?” is finished.

pli-tv-pvr5:52.1.eng: Is a resolution also resolution face-to-face, and is resolution face-to-face also a resolution?

pli-tv-pvr5:52.2.eng: Is a resolution also a majority decision, and is a majority decision also a resolution?

pli-tv-pvr5:52.3.eng: Is a resolution also resolution through recollection, and is resolution through recollection also a resolution?

pli-tv-pvr5:52.4.eng: Is a resolution also resolution because of past insanity, and is resolution because of past insanity also a resolution?

pli-tv-pvr5:52.5.eng: Is a resolution also acting according to what has been admitted, and is acting according to what has been admitted also a resolution?

pli-tv-pvr5:52.6.eng: Is a resolution also a further penalty, and is a further penalty also a resolution?

pli-tv-pvr5:52.7.eng: Is a resolution also covering over as if with grass, and is covering over as if with grass also a resolution?

pli-tv-pvr5:53.1.pli: Vinayo siyā sammukhāvinayo siyā na sammukhāvinayo.
pli-tv-pvr5:53.1.eng: A resolution may be resolution face-to-face, or it may not be resolution face-to-face.

pli-tv-pvr5:53.2.eng: Resolution face-to-face is both a resolution and also resolution face-to-face.

pli-tv-pvr5:54.1.pli: Vinayo siyā yebhuyyasikā, siyā na yebhuyyasikā.
pli-tv-pvr5:54.1.eng: A resolution may be a majority decision, or it may not be a majority decision.

pli-tv-pvr5:54.2.eng: A majority decision is both a resolution and also a majority decision.

pli-tv-pvr5:55.1.pli: Vinayo siyā sativinayo, siyā na sativinayo.
pli-tv-pvr5:55.1.eng: A resolution may be resolution through recollection, or it may not be resolution through recollection.

pli-tv-pvr5:55.2.eng: Resolution through recollection is both a resolution and also resolution through recollection.

pli-tv-pvr5:56.1.pli: Vinayo siyā amūḷhavinayo, siyā na amūḷhavinayo.
pli-tv-pvr5:56.1.eng: A resolution may be resolution because of past insanity, or it may not be resolution because of past insanity.

pli-tv-pvr5:56.2.eng: Resolution because of past insanity is both a resolution and also resolution because of past insanity.

pli-tv-pvr5:57.1.pli: Vinayo siyā paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ, siyā na paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr5:57.1.eng: A resolution may be acting according to what has been admitted, or it may not be acting according to what has been admitted.

pli-tv-pvr5:57.2.eng: Acting according to what has been admitted is both a resolution and also  acting according to what has been admitted.

pli-tv-pvr5:58.1.pli: Vinayo siyā tassapāpiyasikā, siyā na tassapāpiyasikā.
pli-tv-pvr5:58.1.eng: A resolution may be a further penalty, or it may not be a further penalty.

pli-tv-pvr5:58.2.eng: A further penalty is both a resolution and also a further penalty.

pli-tv-pvr5:59.1.pli: Vinayo siyā tiṇavatthārako, siyā na tiṇavatthārako.
pli-tv-pvr5:59.1.eng: A resolution may be covering over as if with grass, or it may not be covering over as if with grass.

pli-tv-pvr5:59.2.eng: Covering over as if with grass is both a resolution and also covering over as if with grass.

pli-tv-pvr5:60.1.eng: The twelfth section on resolution is finished.

pli-tv-pvr5:61.1.eng: Is resolution face-to-face wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate?

pli-tv-pvr5:61.2.eng: Is a majority decision wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate?

pli-tv-pvr5:61.3.eng: Is resolution through recollection wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate?

pli-tv-pvr5:61.4.eng: Is resolution because of past insanity wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate?

pli-tv-pvr5:61.5.eng: Is acting according to what has been admitted wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate?

pli-tv-pvr5:61.6.eng: Is a further penalty wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate?

pli-tv-pvr5:61.7.eng: Is covering over as if with grass wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate?

pli-tv-pvr5:62.1.eng: Resolution face-to-face may be wholesome or indeterminate; resolution face-to-face is never unwholesome. A majority decision may be wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate. Resolution through recollection may be wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate. Resolution because of past insanity may be wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate. Acting according to what has been admitted may be wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate. A further penalty may be wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate. Covering over as if with grass, may be wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate.

pli-tv-pvr5:63.1.pli: Yebhuyyasikā siyā kusalā, siyā akusalā, siyā abyākatā.

pli-tv-pvr5:64.1.pli: Sativinayo siyā kusalo, siyā akusalo, siyā abyākato.

pli-tv-pvr5:65.1.pli: Amūḷhavinayo siyā kusalo, siyā akusalo, siyā abyākato.

pli-tv-pvr5:66.1.pli: Paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ siyā kusalaṃ, siyā akusalaṃ, siyā abyākataṃ.

pli-tv-pvr5:67.1.pli: Tassapāpiyasikā siyā kusalā, siyā akusalā siyā abyākatā.

pli-tv-pvr5:68.1.pli: Tiṇavatthārako siyā kusalo, siyā akusalo, siyā abyākato.

pli-tv-pvr5:69.1.eng: Is a legal issue arising from a dispute wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate?

pli-tv-pvr5:69.2.eng: Is a legal issue arising from an accusation wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate?

pli-tv-pvr5:69.3.eng: Is a legal issue arising from an offense wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate?

pli-tv-pvr5:69.4.eng: Is a legal issues arising from business wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate?

pli-tv-pvr5:70.1.pli: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ siyā kusalaṃ, siyā akusalaṃ, siyā abyākataṃ.
pli-tv-pvr5:70.1.eng: A legal issue arising from a dispute may be wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate. A legal issue arising from an accusation may be wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate. A legal issue arising from an offense may be unwholesome or indeterminate; a legal issue arising from an offense is never wholesome. A legal issue arising from business may be wholesome, unwholesome, or indeterminate.

pli-tv-pvr5:71.1.pli: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ siyā kusalaṃ, siyā akusalaṃ, siyā abyākataṃ.

pli-tv-pvr5:73.1.pli: Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ siyā kusalaṃ, siyā akusalaṃ, siyā abyākataṃ.

pli-tv-pvr5:74.1.eng: The thirteenth section on the wholesome is finished.

pli-tv-pvr5:75.0.eng: 9. The section on “where”, the section on questioning

pli-tv-pvr5:75.1.pli: Yattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati;
pli-tv-pvr5:75.1.eng: Resolution face-to-face is appropriate where a majority decision is appropriate.

pli-tv-pvr5:75.2.pli: yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:75.2.eng: A majority decision is appropriate where resolution face-to-face is appropriate.

pli-tv-pvr5:75.3.pli: Na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati, na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:75.3.eng: But there, resolution through recollection is not appropriate, nor is resolution because of past insanity, acting according to what has been admitted, a further penalty, or covering over as if with grass.

pli-tv-pvr5:76.1.pli: Yattha sativinayo labbhati, tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati;
pli-tv-pvr5:76.1.eng: Resolution face-to-face is appropriate where resolution through recollection is appropriate.

pli-tv-pvr5:76.2.pli: yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, tattha sativinayo labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:76.2.eng: Resolution through recollection is appropriate where resolution face-to-face is appropriate.

pli-tv-pvr5:76.3.pli: Na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati, na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:76.3.eng: But there, resolution because of past insanity is not appropriate, nor is acting according to what has been admitted, a further penalty, covering over as if with grass, or a majority decision.

pli-tv-pvr5:77.1.pli: Yattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati, tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati;
pli-tv-pvr5:77.1.eng: Resolution face-to-face is appropriate where resolution because of past insanity is appropriate.

pli-tv-pvr5:77.2.pli: yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:77.2.eng: Resolution because of past insanity is appropriate where resolution face-to-face is appropriate.

pli-tv-pvr5:77.3.pli: Na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati, na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:77.3.eng: But there, acting according to what has been admitted is not appropriate, nor is a further penalty, covering over as if with grass, a majority decision, or resolution through recollection.

pli-tv-pvr5:78.1.pli: Yattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati, tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati;
pli-tv-pvr5:78.1.eng: Resolution face-to-face is appropriate where acting according to what has been admitted is appropriate.

pli-tv-pvr5:78.2.pli: yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:78.2.eng: Acting according to what has been admitted is appropriate where resolution face-to-face is appropriate.

pli-tv-pvr5:78.3.pli: Na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati, na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:78.3.eng: But there, a further penalty is not appropriate, nor is covering over as if with grass, a majority decision, resolution through recollection, or resolution because of past insanity.

pli-tv-pvr5:79.1.pli: Yattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati, tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati;
pli-tv-pvr5:79.1.eng: Resolution face-to-face is appropriate where a further penalty is appropriate.

pli-tv-pvr5:79.2.pli: yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:79.2.eng: A further penalty is appropriate where resolution face-to-face is appropriate.

pli-tv-pvr5:79.3.pli: Na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:79.3.eng: But there, covering over as if with grass is not appropriate, nor is a majority decision, resolution through recollection, resolution because of past insanity, or acting according to what has been admitted.

pli-tv-pvr5:80.1.pli: Yattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati, tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati;
pli-tv-pvr5:80.1.eng: Resolution face-to-face is appropriate where covering over as if with grass is appropriate.

pli-tv-pvr5:80.2.pli: yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:80.2.eng: Covering over as if with grass is appropriate where resolution face-to-face is appropriate.

pli-tv-pvr5:80.3.pli: Na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:80.3.eng: But there, a majority decision is not appropriate, nor is resolution through recollection, resolution because of past insanity, acting according to what has been admitted, or a further penalty.

pli-tv-pvr5:81.1.eng: Where there is a majority decision, there is resolution face-to-face.

pli-tv-pvr5:81.2.eng: Where there is resolution face-to-face, there is a majority decision.

pli-tv-pvr5:81.3.pli: Na tattha sativinayo, na tattha amūḷhavinayo, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā, na tattha tiṇavatthārako.
pli-tv-pvr5:81.3.eng: But there is no resolution through recollection there, nor resolution because of past insanity, acting according to what has been admitted, a further penalty, or covering over as if with grass.

pli-tv-pvr5:82.1.eng: Where there is resolution through recollection, there is resolution face-to-face.

pli-tv-pvr5:82.2.eng: Where there is resolution face-to-face, there is resolution through recollection.

pli-tv-pvr5:82.3.pli: Na tattha amūḷhavinayo, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā, na tattha tiṇavatthārako, na tattha yebhuyyasikā.
pli-tv-pvr5:82.3.eng: But there is no resolution because of past insanity there, nor acting according to what has been admitted, a further penalty, covering over as if with grass, or a majority decision.

pli-tv-pvr5:82.4.eng: Resolution face-to-face to be done as the basis …

pli-tv-pvr5:83.1.eng: Where there is covering over as if with grass, there is  resolution face-to-face.

pli-tv-pvr5:83.2.eng: Where there is resolution face-to-face, there is covering over as if with grass.

pli-tv-pvr5:83.3.pli: Na tattha yebhuyyasikā, na tattha sativinayo, na tattha amūḷhavinayo, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā.
pli-tv-pvr5:83.3.eng: But there is no majority decision there, nor resolution through recollection, resolution because of past insanity, acting according to what has been admitted, or a further penalty.

pli-tv-pvr5:84.2.eng: The fourteenth section on “where” is finished.

pli-tv-pvr5:85.0.eng: 10. The section on settling, the section on responding

pli-tv-pvr5:85.1.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammati, yattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:85.1.eng: On an occasion when a legal issue is being resolved through resolution face-to-face and a majority decision, then, where a majority decision is appropriate, there resolution face-to-face is appropriate, and where resolution face-to-face is appropriate, there a majority decision is appropriate.

pli-tv-pvr5:85.2.pli: Na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati, na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:85.2.eng: But there resolution through recollection is not appropriate, nor is resolution because of past insanity, acting according to what has been admitted, a further penalty, or covering over as if with grass.

pli-tv-pvr5:86.1.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammati, yattha sativinayo labbhati tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati tattha sativinayo labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:86.1.eng: On an occasion when a legal issue is being resolved through resolution face-to-face and resolution through recollection, then, where resolution through recollection is appropriate, there resolution face-to-face is appropriate, and where resolution face-to-face is appropriate, there resolution through recollection is appropriate.

pli-tv-pvr5:86.2.pli: Na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati, na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:86.2.eng: But there resolution because of past insanity is not appropriate, nor is acting according to what has been admitted, a further penalty, covering over as if with grass, or a majority decision.

pli-tv-pvr5:87.1.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye sammukhāvinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammati, yattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:87.1.eng: On an occasion when a legal issue is being resolved through resolution face-to-face and resolution because of past insanity, then, where resolution because of past insanity is appropriate, there resolution face-to-face is appropriate, and where resolution face-to-face is appropriate, there resolution because of past insanity is appropriate.

pli-tv-pvr5:87.2.pli: Na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati, na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:87.2.eng: But there acting according to what has been admitted is not appropriate, nor is a further penalty, covering over as if with grass, a majority decision, or resolution through recollection.

pli-tv-pvr5:88.1.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammati, yattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:88.1.eng: On an occasion when a legal issue is being resolved through resolution face-to-face and acting according to what has been admitted, then, where acting according to what has been admitted is appropriate, there resolution face-to-face is appropriate, and where resolution face-to-face is appropriate, there acting according to what has been admitted is appropriate.

pli-tv-pvr5:88.2.pli: Na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati, na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:88.2.eng: But there a further penalty is not appropriate, nor is covering over as if with grass, a majority decision, resolution through recollection, or resolution because of past insanity.

pli-tv-pvr5:89.1.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye sammukhāvinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammati, yattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:89.1.eng: On an occasion when a legal issue is being resolved through resolution face-to-face and a further penalty, then, where a further penalty is appropriate, there resolution face-to-face is appropriate, and where resolution face-to-face is appropriate, there a further penalty is appropriate.

pli-tv-pvr5:89.2.pli: Na tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati, na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:89.2.eng: But there covering over as if with grass is not appropriate, nor is a majority decision, resolution through recollection, resolution because of past insanity, or acting according to what has been admitted.

pli-tv-pvr5:90.1.pli: Yasmiṃ samaye sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasammati, yattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati tattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati, yattha sammukhāvinayo labbhati tattha tiṇavatthārako labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:90.1.eng: On an occasion when a legal issue is being resolved through resolution face-to-face and covering over as if with grass, then, where covering over as if with grass is appropriate, there resolution face-to-face is appropriate, and where resolution face-to-face is appropriate, there covering over as if with grass is appropriate.

pli-tv-pvr5:90.2.pli: Na tattha yebhuyyasikā labbhati, na tattha sativinayo labbhati, na tattha amūḷhavinayo labbhati, na tattha paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ labbhati, na tattha tassapāpiyasikā labbhati.
pli-tv-pvr5:90.2.eng: But there a majority decision is not appropriate, nor is resolution through recollection, resolution because of past insanity, acting according to what has been admitted, or a further penalty.

pli-tv-pvr5:91.1.eng: The fifteenth section on settling is finished.

pli-tv-pvr5:92.1.pli: Adhikaraṇanti vā samathāti vā ime dhammā saṃsaṭṭhā udāhu visaṃsaṭṭhā?
pli-tv-pvr5:92.1.eng: “Are ‘legal issue’ and ‘principle for settling’ connected or disconnected?

pli-tv-pvr5:92.2.pli: Labbhā ca panimesaṃ dhammānaṃ vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvā nānākaraṇaṃ paññāpetunti?
pli-tv-pvr5:92.2.eng: Is it possible to completely separate them and point to their difference?”

pli-tv-pvr5:93.1.pli: Adhikaraṇanti vā samathāti vā ime dhammā visaṃsaṭṭhā, no saṃsaṭṭhā.
pli-tv-pvr5:93.1.eng: “‘Legal issue’ and ‘principle for settling’ are disconnected, not connected,

pli-tv-pvr5:93.2.pli: Labbhā ca panimesaṃ dhammānaṃ vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvā nānākaraṇaṃ paññāpetunti.
pli-tv-pvr5:93.2.eng: and it’s possible to completely separate them and point to their difference”:

pli-tv-pvr5:93.3.eng: they should be told not to say this.

pli-tv-pvr5:93.4.pli: Adhikaraṇanti vā samathāti vā ime dhammā saṃsaṭṭhā, no visaṃsaṭṭhā.
pli-tv-pvr5:93.4.eng: “‘Legal issue’ and ‘principle for settling’ are connected, not disconnected,

pli-tv-pvr5:93.5.pli: No ca labbhā imesaṃ dhammānaṃ vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvā nānākaraṇaṃ paññāpetuṃ.
pli-tv-pvr5:93.5.eng: and it’s impossible to completely separate them and point to their difference.

pli-tv-pvr5:93.8.eng: there are four kinds of legal issues and seven principles for settling?

pli-tv-pvr5:93.9.pli: Adhikaraṇā samathehi sammanti, samathā adhikaraṇehi sammanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:93.9.eng: Legal issues are settled through the principles for settling; the principles for settling are settled through legal issues.
pli-tv-pvr5:93.9.comm: The latter of these two is explained at Vmv 5.306: Samathāadhikaraṇehi sammantīti apalokanādīhi catūhi kiccādhikaraṇehi sabbepi samathā niṭṭhānaṁ gacchanti, nāññehīti imamatthaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ, “Samathāadhikaraṇehi sammanti: with the four legal issues arising from business, starting with the legal procedure of getting permission, all principles for settling, too, come to an end, but not with any other legal issue. It was said with reference to this.”

pli-tv-pvr5:93.10.pli: Evaṃ, ime dhammā saṃsaṭṭhā no visaṃsaṭṭhā;
pli-tv-pvr5:93.10.eng: In this way they are connected, not disconnected,

pli-tv-pvr5:93.11.pli: no ca labbhā imesaṃ dhammānaṃ vinibbhujitvā vinibbhujitvā nānākaraṇaṃ paññāpetun”ti.
pli-tv-pvr5:93.11.eng: and it’s impossible to completely separate them and point to their difference.”

pli-tv-pvr5:94.1.eng: The sixteenth section on connection is finished.

pli-tv-pvr5:126.1.eng: The eighteenth section on settling and not settling is finished.

pli-tv-pvr5:127.0.eng: 14. The section on principles for settling and legal issues

pli-tv-pvr5:127.1.eng: Are principles for settling settled through principles for settling?

pli-tv-pvr5:127.2.eng: Are principles for settling settled through legal issues?

pli-tv-pvr5:127.3.eng: Are legal issues settled through principles for settling?

pli-tv-pvr5:127.4.eng: Are legal issues settled through legal issues?

pli-tv-pvr5:128.1.pli: Siyā samathā samathehi sammanti, siyā samathā samathehi na sammanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:128.1.eng: It may be that principles for settling are settled through principles for settling; it may be that principles for settling are not settled through principles for settling.

pli-tv-pvr5:128.2.pli: Siyā samathā adhikaraṇehi sammanti, siyā samathā adhikaraṇehi na sammanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:128.2.eng: It may be that principles for settling are settled through legal issues; it may be that principles for settling are not settled through legal issues.

pli-tv-pvr5:128.3.pli: Siyā adhikaraṇā samathehi sammanti, siyā adhikaraṇā samathehi na sammanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:128.3.eng: It may be that legal issues are settled through principles for settling; it may be that legal issues are not settled through principles for settling.

pli-tv-pvr5:128.4.pli: Siyā adhikaraṇā adhikaraṇehi sammanti, siyā adhikaraṇā adhikaraṇehi na sammanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:128.4.eng: It may be that legal issues are settled through legal issues; it may be that legal issues are not settled through legal issues.

pli-tv-pvr5:129.1.pli: Kathaṃ siyā samathā samathehi sammanti, kathaṃ siyā samathā samathehi na sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr5:129.1.eng: How may it be that principles for settling are settled through principles for settling? And how may it be that principles for settling are not settled through principles for settling?

pli-tv-pvr5:129.2.eng: A majority decision is settled through resolution face-to-face.

pli-tv-pvr5:129.3.pli: sativinayena na sammati, amūḷhavinayena na sammati, paṭiññātakaraṇena na sammati, tassapāpiyasikāya na sammati, tiṇavatthārakena na sammati.
pli-tv-pvr5:129.3.eng: It is not settled through resolution through recollection, through resolution because of past insanity, through acting according to what has been admitted, through a further penalty, or through covering over as if with grass.

pli-tv-pvr5:130.1.eng: Resolution through recollection is settled through resolution face-to-face.

pli-tv-pvr5:130.2.pli: amūḷhavinayena na sammati, paṭiññātakaraṇena na sammāti, tassapāpiyasikāya na sammati, tiṇavatthārakena na sammati, yebhuyyasikāya na sammati.
pli-tv-pvr5:130.2.eng: It is not settled through resolution because of past insanity, through acting according to what has been admitted, through a further penalty, through covering over as if with grass, or through a majority decision.

pli-tv-pvr5:131.1.eng: Resolution because of past insanity is settled through resolution face-to-face.

pli-tv-pvr5:131.2.pli: paṭiññātakaraṇena na sammati, tassapāpiyasikāya na sammati, tiṇavatthārakena na sammati, yebhuyyasikāya na sammati, sativinayena na sammati.
pli-tv-pvr5:131.2.eng: It is not settled through acting according to what has been admitted, through a further penalty, through covering over as if with grass, through a majority decision, or through resolution through recollection.

pli-tv-pvr5:132.1.eng: Acting according to what has been admitted is settled through resolution face-to-face.

pli-tv-pvr5:132.2.pli: tassapāpiyasikāya na sammati, tiṇavatthārakena na sammati, yebhuyyasikāya na sammati, sativinayena na sammati, amūḷhavinayena na sammati.
pli-tv-pvr5:132.2.eng: It is not settled through a further penalty, through covering over as if with grass, through a majority decision, through resolution through recollection, or through resolution because of past insanity.

pli-tv-pvr5:133.1.eng: A further penalty is settled through resolution face-to-face.

pli-tv-pvr5:133.2.pli: tiṇavatthārakena na sammati, yebhuyyasikāya na sammati, sativinayena na sammati, amūḷhavinayena na sammati, paṭiññātakaraṇena na sammati.
pli-tv-pvr5:133.2.eng: It is not settled through covering over as if with grass, through a majority decision, through resolution through recollection, through resolution because of past insanity, or through acting according to what has been admitted.

pli-tv-pvr5:134.1.eng: Covering over as if with grass is settled through resolution face-to-face.

pli-tv-pvr5:134.2.pli: yebhuyyasikāya na sammati, sativinayena na sammati, amūḷhavinayena na sammati, paṭiññātakaraṇena na sammati, tassapāpiyasikāya na sammati.
pli-tv-pvr5:134.2.eng: It is not settled through a majority decision, through resolution through recollection, through resolution because of past insanity, through acting according to what has been admitted, or through a further penalty.

pli-tv-pvr5:134.4.pli: Evaṃ siyā samathā samathehi na sammanti.

pli-tv-pvr5:135.1.pli: Kathaṃ siyā samathā adhikaraṇehi sammanti, kathaṃ siyā samathā adhikaraṇehi na sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr5:135.1.eng: How may it be that principles for settling are settled through legal issues? How may it be that principles for settling are not settled through legal issues?

pli-tv-pvr5:135.2.pli: Sammukhāvinayo vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:135.2.eng: Resolution face-to-face is not settled through a legal issue arising from a dispute, a legal issue arising from an accusation, or a legal issue arising from an offense.

pli-tv-pvr5:135.3.eng: It is settled through a legal issue arising from business.

pli-tv-pvr5:136.1.pli: Yebhuyyasikā vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:136.1.eng: A majority decision is not settled through a legal issue arising from a dispute, a legal issue arising from an accusation, or a legal issue arising from an offense.

pli-tv-pvr5:136.2.eng: It is settled through a legal issue arising from business.

pli-tv-pvr5:137.1.pli: Sativinayo vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:137.1.eng: Resolution through recollection is not settled through a legal issue arising from a dispute, a legal issue arising from an accusation, or a legal issue arising from an offense.

pli-tv-pvr5:137.2.eng: It is settled through a legal issue arising from business.

pli-tv-pvr5:138.1.pli: Amūḷhavinayo vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:138.1.eng: Resolution because of past insanity is not settled through a legal issue arising from a dispute, a legal issue arising from an accusation, or a legal issue arising from an offense.

pli-tv-pvr5:138.2.eng: It is settled through a legal issue arising from business.

pli-tv-pvr5:139.1.pli: Paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:139.1.eng: Acting according to what has been admitted is not settled through a legal issue arising from a dispute, a legal issue arising from an accusation, or a legal issue arising from an offense.

pli-tv-pvr5:139.2.eng: It is settled through a legal issue arising from business.

pli-tv-pvr5:140.1.pli: Tassapāpiyasikā vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:140.1.eng: A further penalty is not settled through a legal issue arising from a dispute, a legal issue arising from an accusation, or a legal issue arising from an offense.

pli-tv-pvr5:140.2.eng: It is settled through a legal issue arising from business.

pli-tv-pvr5:141.1.pli: Tiṇavatthārako vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:141.1.eng: Covering over as if with grass is not settled through a legal issue arising from a dispute, a legal issue arising from an accusation, or a legal issue arising from an offense.

pli-tv-pvr5:141.2.eng: It is settled through a legal issue arising from business.

pli-tv-pvr5:141.4.pli: Evaṃ siyā samathā adhikaraṇehi na sammanti.

pli-tv-pvr5:142.1.pli: Kathaṃ siyā adhikaraṇā samathehi sammanti, kathaṃ siyā adhikaraṇā samathehi na sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr5:142.1.eng: How may it be that legal issues are settled through principles for settling? How may it be that legal issues are not settled through principles for settling?

pli-tv-pvr5:142.2.pli: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya ca sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:142.2.eng: A legal issue arising from a dispute is settled through resolution face-to-face and through a majority decision.

pli-tv-pvr5:142.3.pli: sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca tiṇavatthārakena ca na sammati.
pli-tv-pvr5:142.3.eng: It is not settled through resolution through recollection, through resolution because of past insanity, through acting according to what has been admitted, through a further penalty, or through covering over as if with grass.

pli-tv-pvr5:143.1.pli: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:143.1.eng: A legal issue arising from an accusation is settled through resolution face-to-face, through resolution through recollection, through resolution because of past insanity, and through a further penalty.

pli-tv-pvr5:143.2.pli: yebhuyyasikāya ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca na sammati.
pli-tv-pvr5:143.2.eng: It is not settled through a majority decision, through acting according to what has been admitted, or through covering over as if with grass.

pli-tv-pvr5:144.1.pli: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:144.1.eng: A legal issue arising from an offense is settled through resolution face-to-face, through acting according to what has been admitted, and through covering over as if with grass.

pli-tv-pvr5:144.2.pli: yebhuyyasikāya ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca na sammati.
pli-tv-pvr5:144.2.eng: It is not settled through a majority decision, through resolution through recollection, through resolution because of past insanity, or through a further penalty.

pli-tv-pvr5:145.1.eng: A legal issue arising from business is settled through resolution face-to-face.

pli-tv-pvr5:145.2.pli: yebhuyyasikāya ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca tiṇavatthārakena ca na sammati.
pli-tv-pvr5:145.2.eng: It is not settled through a majority decision, through resolution through recollection, through resolution because of past insanity, through acting according to what has been admitted, through a further penalty, or through covering over as if with grass.

pli-tv-pvr5:145.4.pli: Evaṃ siyā adhikaraṇā samathehi na sammanti.

pli-tv-pvr5:146.1.pli: Kathaṃ siyā adhikaraṇā adhikaraṇehi sammanti? Kathaṃ siyā adhikaraṇā adhikaraṇehi na sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr5:146.1.eng: How may it be that legal issues are settled through legal issues? How may it be that legal issues are not settled through legal issues?

pli-tv-pvr5:146.2.pli: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:146.2.eng: A legal issue arising from a dispute is not settled through a legal issue arising from a dispute, through a legal issue arising from an accusation, or through a legal issue arising from an offense.

pli-tv-pvr5:146.3.eng: It is settled through a legal issue arising from business.

pli-tv-pvr5:147.1.pli: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:147.1.eng: A legal issue arising from an accusation is not settled through a legal issue arising from a dispute, through a legal issue arising from an accusation, or through a legal issue arising from an offense.

pli-tv-pvr5:147.2.eng: It is settled through a legal issue arising from business.

pli-tv-pvr5:148.1.pli: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:148.1.eng: A legal issue arising from an offense is not settled through a legal issue arising from a dispute, through a legal issue arising from an accusation, or through a legal issue arising from an offense.

pli-tv-pvr5:148.2.eng: It is settled through a legal issue arising from business.

pli-tv-pvr5:149.1.pli: Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ vivādādhikaraṇena na sammati, anuvādādhikaraṇena na sammati, āpattādhikaraṇena na sammati;
pli-tv-pvr5:149.1.eng: A legal issue arising from business is not settled through a legal issue arising from a dispute, through a legal issue arising from an accusation, or through a legal issue arising from an offense.

pli-tv-pvr5:149.2.eng: It is settled through a legal issue arising from business.

pli-tv-pvr5:149.4.pli: Evaṃ siyā adhikaraṇā adhikaraṇehi na sammanti.

pli-tv-pvr5:150.1.pli: Chāpi samathā cattāropi adhikaraṇā sammukhāvinayena sammanti;
pli-tv-pvr5:150.1.eng: The six principles for settling and the four legal issues are settled through resolution face-to-face.

pli-tv-pvr5:150.2.eng: Resolution face-to-face is not settled through anything.

pli-tv-pvr5:151.1.eng: The nineteenth section on principles for settling and legal issues is finished.

pli-tv-pvr5:152.0.eng: 15. The section on causing to originate

pli-tv-pvr5:152.1.pli: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti?
pli-tv-pvr5:152.1.eng: Which of the four legal issues causes a legal issue arising from a dispute to originate?

pli-tv-pvr5:152.2.pli: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ na katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti;

pli-tv-pvr5:152.3.pli: api ca vivādādhikaraṇapaccayā cattāro adhikaraṇā jāyanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:152.3.eng: Nevertheless, the four legal issues are produced from a legal issue arising from a dispute.

pli-tv-pvr5:152.5.eng: It may be that monks are disputing, saying,

pli-tv-pvr5:152.6.pli: “dhammo”ti vā, “adhammo”ti vā, “vinayo”ti vā, “avinayo”ti vā, “abhāsitaṃ alapitaṃ tathāgatenā”ti vā, “bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ tathāgatenā”ti vā, “anāciṇṇaṃ tathāgatenā”ti vā, “āciṇṇaṃ tathāgatenā”ti vā, “apaññattaṃ tathāgatenā”ti vā, “paññattaṃ tathāgatenā”ti vā, “āpattī”ti vā, “anāpattī”ti vā, “lahukā āpattī”ti vā, “garukā āpattī”ti vā, “sāvasesā āpattī”ti vā, “anavasesā āpattī”ti vā, “duṭṭhullā āpattī”ti vā “aduṭṭhullā āpattī”ti vā.
pli-tv-pvr5:152.6.eng: “This is the Teaching”, “This is contrary to the Teaching”, “This is the Monastic Law”, “This is contrary to the Monastic Law”, “This was spoken by the Buddha”, “This was not spoken by the Buddha”, “This was practiced by the Buddha”, “This was not practiced by the Buddha”, “This was laid down by the Buddha”, “This was not laid down by the Buddha”, “This is an offense”, “This is not an offense”, “This is a light offense”, “This is a heavy offense”, “This is a curable offense”, “This is an incurable offense”, “This is a grave offense”, or “This is a minor offense.”

pli-tv-pvr5:152.7.pli: Yaṃ tattha bhaṇḍanaṃ kalaho viggaho vivādo nānāvādo aññathāvādo vipaccatāya vohāro medhakaṃ, idaṃ vuccati vivādādhikaraṇaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr5:152.7.eng: In regard to this, whatever there is of quarreling, arguing, conflict, disputing, variety in opinion, difference in opinion, heated speech, or strife—this is called a legal issue arising from a dispute.

pli-tv-pvr5:152.8.eng: When, during a legal issue arising from a dispute, the Sangha disputes, there is a legal issue arising from a dispute.
pli-tv-pvr5:152.8.comm: The punctuation of the Pali in this and the next two segments does not seem right. The purpose of this and the next three sentences is to answer the question posed just above about how the four legal issues are produced from a legal issue arising from a dispute. For this to work, I propose the following punctuation: Vivādādhikaraṇe saṅgho vivadati vivādādhikaraṇaṁ. Vivadamāno anuvadati anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ. Anuvadamāno āpattiṁ āpajjati āpattādhikaraṇaṁ. Tāya āpattiyā saṅgho kammaṁ karoti kiccādhikaraṇaṁ. This suggestion is supported by the punctuation found in the parallel passage at Pvr 11:32.9–32.11. I translate accordingly. And also below for the other three kinds of legal issues.

pli-tv-pvr5:152.9.eng: When one who is disputing makes an accusation, there is a legal issue arising from an accusation.

pli-tv-pvr5:152.10.eng: When one who is accusing commits an offense, there is a legal issue arising from an offense.

pli-tv-pvr5:152.11.pli: Tāya āpattiyā saṅgho kammaṃ karoti kiccādhikaraṇaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr5:152.11.eng: When the Sangha does a legal procedure because of that offense, there is a legal issue arising from business.

pli-tv-pvr5:153.1.pli: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti?
pli-tv-pvr5:153.1.eng: Which of the four legal issues causes a legal issue arising from an accusation to originate?

pli-tv-pvr5:153.2.pli: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ na katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti;

pli-tv-pvr5:153.3.pli: api ca anuvādādhikaraṇapaccayā cattāro adhikaraṇā jāyanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:153.3.eng: Nevertheless, the four legal issues are produced from a legal issue arising from an accusation.

pli-tv-pvr5:153.5.pli: Idha bhikkhū bhikkhuṃ anuvadanti sīlavipattiyā vā ācāravipattiyā vā diṭṭhivipattiyā vā ājīvavipattiyā vā.
pli-tv-pvr5:153.5.eng: It may be that the monks accuse a monk of failure in morality, failure in conduct, failure in view, or failure in livelihood.

pli-tv-pvr5:153.6.pli: Yo tattha anuvādo anuvadanā anullapanā anubhaṇanā anusampavaṅkatā abbhussahanatā anubalappadānaṃ, idaṃ vuccati anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr5:153.6.eng: In regard to this, whatever there is of accusations, accusing, allegations, blame, taking sides because of friendship, taking part in the accusation, or supporting the accusation—this is called a legal issue arising from an accusation.

pli-tv-pvr5:153.7.eng: When, during a legal issue arising from an accusation, the Sangha disputes, there is a legal issue arising from a dispute.

pli-tv-pvr5:153.8.eng: When one who is disputing makes an accusation, there is a legal issue arising from an accusation.

pli-tv-pvr5:153.9.eng: When one who is accusing commits an offense, there is a legal issue arising from an offense.

pli-tv-pvr5:153.10.pli: Tāya āpattiyā saṅgho kammaṃ karoti kiccādhikaraṇaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr5:153.10.eng: When the Sangha does a legal procedure because of that offense, there is a legal issue arising from business.

pli-tv-pvr5:154.1.pli: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti?
pli-tv-pvr5:154.1.eng: Which of the four legal issues causes a legal issue arising from an offense to originate?

pli-tv-pvr5:154.2.pli: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ na katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti;

pli-tv-pvr5:154.3.pli: api ca āpattādhikaraṇapaccayā cattāro adhikaraṇā jāyanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:154.3.eng: Nevertheless, the four legal issues are produced from a legal issue arising from an offense.

pli-tv-pvr5:154.5.pli: Pañcapi āpattikkhandhā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ, sattapi āpattikkhandhā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ, idaṃ vuccati āpattādhikaraṇaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr5:154.5.eng: There are legal issues arising from offenses because of the five classes of offenses, and there are legal issues arising from offenses because of the seven classes of offenses—these are called legal issues arising from offenses.

pli-tv-pvr5:154.6.eng: When, during a legal issue arising from an offense, the Sangha disputes, there is a legal issue arising from a dispute.

pli-tv-pvr5:154.7.eng: When one who is disputing makes an accusation, there is a legal issue arising from an accusation.

pli-tv-pvr5:154.8.eng: When one who is accusing commits an offense, there is a legal issue arising from an offense.

pli-tv-pvr5:154.9.pli: Tāya āpattiyā saṅgho kammaṃ karoti kiccādhikaraṇaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr5:154.9.eng: When the Sangha does a legal procedure because of that offense, there is a legal issue arising from business.

pli-tv-pvr5:155.1.pli: Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti?
pli-tv-pvr5:155.1.eng: Which of the four legal issues causes a legal issue arising from business to originate?

pli-tv-pvr5:155.2.pli: Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ na katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,

pli-tv-pvr5:155.3.pli: api ca kiccādhikaraṇapaccayā cattāro adhikaraṇā jāyanti.
pli-tv-pvr5:155.3.eng: Nevertheless, the four legal issues are produced from a legal issue arising from business.

pli-tv-pvr5:155.5.pli: Yā saṅghassa kiccayatā karaṇīyatā apalokanakammaṃ ñattikammaṃ ñattidutiyakammaṃ ñatticatutthakammaṃ, idaṃ vuccati kiccādhikaraṇaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr5:155.5.eng: Whatever is the duty or the business of the Sangha—a legal procedure consisting of getting permission, a legal procedure consisting of one motion, a legal procedure consisting of one motion and one announcement, a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements—this is called a legal issue arising from business.

pli-tv-pvr5:155.6.eng: When, during a legal issue arising from business, the Sangha disputes, there is a legal issue arising from a dispute.

pli-tv-pvr5:155.7.eng: When one who is disputing makes an accusation, there is a legal issue arising from an accusation.

pli-tv-pvr5:155.8.eng: When one who is accusing commits an offense, there is a legal issue arising from an offense.

pli-tv-pvr5:155.9.pli: Tāya āpattiyā saṅgho kammaṃ karoti kiccādhikaraṇaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr5:155.9.eng: When the Sangha does a legal procedure because of that offense, there is a legal issue arising from business.

pli-tv-pvr5:156.1.eng: The twentieth section on causing to originate is finished.

pli-tv-pvr5:157.1.pli: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ bhajati?
pli-tv-pvr5:157.1.eng: “To which of the four legal issues does a legal issue arising from a dispute belong?

pli-tv-pvr5:157.2.eng: Which legal issue does it depend on?

pli-tv-pvr5:157.3.eng: Which legal issue is it included in?

pli-tv-pvr5:157.4.eng: Which legal issue is it grouped with?

pli-tv-pvr5:158.1.pli: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ bhajati?
pli-tv-pvr5:158.1.eng: To which of the four legal issues does a legal issue arising from an accusation belong?

pli-tv-pvr5:158.2.eng: Which legal issue does it depend on?

pli-tv-pvr5:158.3.eng: Which legal issue is it included in?

pli-tv-pvr5:158.4.eng: Which legal issue is it grouped with?

pli-tv-pvr5:159.1.pli: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ bhajati?
pli-tv-pvr5:159.1.eng: To which of the four legal issues does a legal issue arising from an offense belong?

pli-tv-pvr5:159.2.eng: Which legal issue does it depend on?

pli-tv-pvr5:159.3.eng: Which legal issue is it included in?

pli-tv-pvr5:159.4.eng: Which legal issue is it grouped with?

pli-tv-pvr5:160.1.pli: Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ bhajati?
pli-tv-pvr5:160.1.eng: To which of the four legal issues does a legal issue arising from business belong?

pli-tv-pvr5:160.2.eng: Which legal issue does it depend on?

pli-tv-pvr5:160.3.eng: Which legal issue is it included in?

pli-tv-pvr5:160.4.eng: Which legal issue is it grouped with?

pli-tv-pvr5:161.1.pli: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ vivādādhikaraṇaṃ bhajati, vivādādhikaraṇaṃ upanissitaṃ, vivādādhikaraṇaṃ pariyāpannaṃ, vivādādhikaraṇena saṅgahitaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr5:161.1.eng: A legal issue arising from a dispute belongs to legal issues arising from disputes; it depends on legal issues arising from disputes; it is included in legal issues arising from disputes; it is grouped with legal issues arising from disputes.

pli-tv-pvr5:162.1.pli: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ bhajati, anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ upanissitaṃ, anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ pariyāpannaṃ, anuvādādhikaraṇena saṅgahitaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr5:162.1.eng: A legal issue arising from an accusation belongs to legal issues arising from accusations; it depends on legal issues arising from accusations; it is included in legal issues arising from accusations; it is grouped with legal issues arising from accusations.

pli-tv-pvr5:163.1.pli: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ bhajati, āpattādhikaraṇaṃ upanissitaṃ, āpattādhikaraṇaṃ pariyāpannaṃ, āpattādhikaraṇena saṅgahitaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr5:163.1.eng: A legal issue arising from an offense belongs to legal issues arising from offenses; it depends on legal issues arising from offenses; it is included in legal issues arising from offenses; it is grouped with legal issues arising from offenses.

pli-tv-pvr5:164.1.pli: Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ kiccādhikaraṇaṃ bhajati, kiccādhikaraṇaṃ upanissitaṃ, kiccādhikaraṇaṃ pariyāpannaṃ, kiccādhikaraṇena saṅgahitaṃ.
pli-tv-pvr5:164.1.eng: A legal issue arising from business belongs to legal issues arising from business; it depends on legal issues arising from business; it is included in legal issues arising from business; it is grouped with legal issues arising from business.

pli-tv-pvr5:165.1.pli: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ sattannaṃ samathānaṃ kati samathe bhajati, kati samathe upanissitaṃ, kati samathe pariyāpannaṃ, katihi samathehi saṅgahitaṃ, katihi samathehi sammati?
pli-tv-pvr5:165.1.eng: To how many of the seven principles for settling does a legal issue arising from a dispute belong? On how many principles for settling does it depend? In how many principles for settling is it included? With how many principles for settling is it grouped? Through how many principles for settling is it settled?

pli-tv-pvr5:166.1.pli: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ sattannaṃ samathānaṃ kati samathe bhajati, kati samathe upanissitaṃ, kati samathe pariyāpannaṃ, katihi samathehi saṅgahitaṃ, katihi samathehi sammati?
pli-tv-pvr5:166.1.eng: To how many of the seven principles for settling does a legal issue arising from an accusation belong? On how many principles for settling does it depend? In how many principles for settling is it included? With how many principles for settling is it grouped? Through how many principles for settling is it settled?

pli-tv-pvr5:167.1.pli: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sattannaṃ samathānaṃ kati samathe bhajati, kati samathe upanissitaṃ, kati samathe pariyāpannaṃ, katihi samathehi saṅgahitaṃ, katihi samathehi sammati?
pli-tv-pvr5:167.1.eng: To how many of the seven principles for settling does a legal issue arising from an offense belong? On how many principles for settling does it depend? In how many principles for settling is it included? With how many principles for settling is it grouped? Through how many principles for settling is it settled?

pli-tv-pvr5:168.1.pli: Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ sattannaṃ samathānaṃ kati samathe bhajati, kati samathe upanissitaṃ, kati samathe pariyāpannaṃ, katihi samathehi saṅgahitaṃ, katihi samathehi sammati?
pli-tv-pvr5:168.1.eng: To how many of the seven principles for settling does a legal issue arising from business belong? On how many principles for settling does it depend? In how many principles for settling is it included? With how many principles for settling is it grouped? Through how many principles for settling is it settled?

pli-tv-pvr5:169.1.pli: Vivādādhikaraṇaṃ sattannaṃ samathānaṃ dve samathe bhajati, dve samathe upanissitaṃ, dve samathe pariyāpannaṃ, dvīhi samathehi saṅgahitaṃ, dvīhi samathehi sammati—
pli-tv-pvr5:169.1.eng: A legal issue arising from a dispute belongs to two principles for settling; it depends on two principles for settling; it is included in two principles for settling; it is grouped with two principles for settling; it is settled through two principles for settling:

pli-tv-pvr5:169.2.eng: through resolution face-to-face and through a majority decision.

pli-tv-pvr5:170.1.pli: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ sattannaṃ samathānaṃ cattāro samathe bhajati, cattāro samathe upanissitaṃ, cattāro samathe pariyāpannaṃ, catūhi samathehi saṅgahitaṃ, catūhi samathehi sammati—
pli-tv-pvr5:170.1.eng: A legal issue arising from an accusation belongs to four principles for settling; it depends on four principles for settling; it is included in four principles for settling; it is grouped with four principles for settling; it is settled through four principles for settling:

pli-tv-pvr5:170.2.pli: sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:170.2.eng: through resolution face-to-face, through resolution through recollection, through resolution because of past insanity, and through a further penalty.

pli-tv-pvr5:171.1.pli: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sattannaṃ samathānaṃ tayo samathe bhajati, tayo samathe upanissitaṃ, tayo samathe pariyāpannaṃ, tīhi samathehi saṅgahitaṃ tīhi samathehi sammati—
pli-tv-pvr5:171.1.eng: A legal issue arising from an offense belongs to three principles for settling; it depends on three principles for settling; it is included in three principles for settling; it is grouped with three principles for settling; it is settled through three principles for settling:

pli-tv-pvr5:171.2.pli: sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr5:171.2.eng: through resolution face-to-face, through acting according to what has been admitted, and through covering over as if with grass.

pli-tv-pvr5:172.1.pli: Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ sattannaṃ samathānaṃ ekaṃ samathaṃ bhajati, ekaṃ samathaṃ upanissitaṃ, ekaṃ samathaṃ pariyāpannaṃ, ekena samathena saṅgahitaṃ, ekena samathena sammati—
pli-tv-pvr5:172.1.eng: A legal issue arising from business belongs to one principle for settling; it depends on one principle for settling; it is included in one principle for settling; it is grouped with one principle for settling; it is settled through one principle for settling:

pli-tv-pvr5:173.1.eng: The twenty-first section on “belonging to” is finished.

pli-tv-pvr5:174.1.eng: The legal issues and their settling are finished.

pli-tv-pvr5:176.3.eng: Principles for settling used in common,

pli-tv-pvr5:176.4.eng: Principles for settling that belong with that.

pli-tv-pvr5:177.1.eng: Principle for settling is also resolution face-to-face,

pli-tv-pvr5:177.2.eng: On resolution, and on the wholesome;

pli-tv-pvr5:177.4.eng: On settling, and on not settling;

pli-tv-pvr5:177.5.eng: And on principles for settling and legal issues,
